name: Task list app with sorting, filtering and conditional rendering
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


This is an example todo or task list app that has been marked up with the Buzzy Figma plugin. It demonstrates some useful Buzzy techniques including conditional rendering, form validation, sorting and filtering.

Grab this file, install the plugin and hit publish - you'll have a working app in a browser. Use this file as a reference for creating and publishing your own data-driven apps using Buzzy, directly from Figma.
